name: Fleuret de Fleur
text: Activate this card by targeting 1 Level 2 or lower monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but negate its effects, also equip it with this card. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. The equipped monster gains 700 ATK. If this card is sent from the Spell & Trap Zone to the GY: You can equip this card to a Synchro Monster you control. You can only use this effect of "Fleuret de Fleur" once per turn. You can only activate 1 "Fleuret de Fleur" per turn.
